title: Mitchell
author: Mitchell
created_time: December 10, 2022, 09:08:26 PMLast edit: August 02, 2023, 09:49:06 PM by Mitchell
content: Hello everyone,I'm hereby auction off my last two sealed keep keys. You do need to sign up for the ShapeShift Platform to make optimal use of this hardware wallet, so might be better to purchase it as a collectors piece.LotsSealed KeepKeySealed KeepKeyCurrent bidsthiago007 - 0.001BTCKryptoWerk - 0.0015BTCAuction detailsStarting bid: 0.0005BTC Bid increment: 0.0005BTCShipping: Not included. Shipping will be based on location and preference.End date and time: Tuesday, 13 December at 23:59 (Amsterdam Time)Sniping: Bids in the last 10 minutes extend the whole auction (not just the lot) to a maximum of 10 minutes after the last bid.Payment: I only accept Bitcoin and payment must be send to bc1q7tcx4dz2k32mctxmkthqrax3hvjkfcy8xyu4ff. Make sure to send me your TXID.Other:Proof of funds or a collateral may be asked from new bidders to be eligible to bid on the auction.I reserve the right to reject bids from or deny sale to any individual for any reason.Pictures

comments.body: Quote from: PeakDK on December 10, 2022, 09:12:10 PM0.0005BTC Which lot? Or do you want to bid on both lots? EDIT: I've put you down for both, for now.

comments.body: Final winners:thiago007 - 0.001BTCKryptoWerk - 0.0015BTCI'll send you a private message to ask about your shipping address, so I can give you a quote for shipping. Final payment goes to the address in the OP.
